name: Cookies in Space
description:
Cookies in Space was one of the first games I had created when I first got into developing games. I have now decided to return to it and update it and develop it within Unity as the original was developed in Game Maker and is now the first game I am publishing publicly.  

Dodge asteroids and collect as many cookies as you can!

Controls: 

Left & Right arrow keys to move the spaceship left & right. 

Sound effects made using bfxr: 
http://www.bfxr.net/

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/aakashmaIik
